title: STF nabs suspect with 1,700 L of Diesel
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Special Task Force of Police has apprehended a suspect over illegal stockpiling of 1,700 liters of Diesel
According to Police, the arrest has been carried out yesterday (2) based on a tip off received by STF personnel in Middeniya.
The Police have conducted a raid and arrested a suspect, identified as a 45-year old resident of Middeniya area, and managed to seize 1,700 liters of Diesel. Further investigations are underway.
